home.title: Homepage - Help
home.description: The main page shows all important information about the laboratory in Pattaya at a glance.

sections.title: 🎯 Understanding the Status Banner
sections.content:
The colored banner at the top shows current status:
• 🟢 **Open** - Normal operation, appointments available
• 🔴 **Closed** - Closed today
• 🟡 **Vacation** - Extended absence with return date
• 🔵 **Educational Leave** - Training/education
• 🟠 **Congress** - Medical conference attendance

sections.title: 📅 Reading Opening Hours
sections.content:
**Today View:** Shows today's opening hours
**Week View:** Complete week overview
**Month View:** Full calendar with exceptions

**Exceptions** are always highlighted in red.

sections.title: 🌍 Switching Languages
sections.content:
Click on the flag icons in the top right:
• 🇺🇸 **EN** - English
• 🇩🇪 **DE** - German
• 🇹🇭 **TH** - ไทย (Thai)

Your language setting is automatically saved.

sections.title: 📱 Contact & Navigation
sections.content:
**Call:** Tap the phone number to call
**Email:** Tap the email address to send message
**Navigation:** Tap 'Route' for Google Maps
**Social Media:** QR codes for Line, Facebook, WhatsApp

quick_actions.title: 📢 Current Announcements
quick_actions.description: Important notices are below the status banner

tooltips.status_banner: Current laboratory status - click for details
tooltips.language_switch: Change language - your choice is saved
tooltips.qr_code: QR code to share this page

faqs.question: How can I make an appointment?
faqs.answer: Call us at +66 38 123 456 or message us on WhatsApp. Online booking is currently not available.

faqs.question: Are the opening hours always current?
faqs.answer: Yes! The times are maintained daily by the lab team. Exceptions and holidays are displayed immediately.

faqs.question: Does the site work without internet?
faqs.answer: Partially yes. Once loaded content remains available, but updates require internet connection.

admin_dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard - Help
admin_dashboard.description: The Admin Dashboard is your control center for managing all portal content. All changes become immediately visible to the public.

sections.title: 🚀 First Steps After Login
sections.content:
1. **Check Status** - Is the current status correct?
2. **Update Contact Details** - Phone, email, address
3. **Set Opening Hours** - Weekly schedule and exceptions
4. **Create First Announcement** - For important information

sections.title: ⚡ Quick Status Changes
sections.content:
**Emergency changes** can be made directly in the dashboard:
• **Immediate Closure** - For technical problems
• **Set to Vacation** - With return date
• **Add Announcement** - For important information

⚠️ **Warning:** Changes are immediately visible to all visitors!

faqs.question: How does the QR code system work?
faqs.answer: Visitors scan the QR code at your door with their smartphone and get direct access to current information. No app installation required.

faqs.question: Are changes immediately visible?
faqs.answer: Yes, all changes in the admin area are immediately displayed on the public page. There is no delay.
